6.0.0.commit_description: Update against FFmpeg 6.0 upstream release. Closes: https://github.com/phoronix-test-suite/phoronix-test-suite/issues/702

3.0.0.commit_description: Update to use vbench with x264 and x265 options, switch to latest FFmpeg 5.1.2 release, other improvements to make this test useful...

2.7.2.commit_description: Use gmake on BSD to fix build, update download links too.

2.5.0.commit_description: Update against FFmpeg 2.8.1, also use --disable-doc on build process.

2.4.0.commit_description: Update download links and update against upstream FFmpeg 2.6.2.

2.0.0.commit_description: Update ffmpeg test profile against upstream FFmpeg 1.0 application and switch to H.264 HD input file.

1.6.0.commit_description: Update to upstream FFmpeg 0.8.2, require Yasm external dependency.
